mutants.original_line: """Filters out the words that do not contain the letter 'a' (ignoring case sensitivity), removes duplicates, and returns the resulting list in alphabetical order."""
return sorted(set(word.lower() for word in words if 'a' in word.lower()))
mutants.mutated_line: return sorted(set((word.lower() for word in words if 'a' not in word.lower())))

mutants.original_line: return sorted(set(word.lower() for word in words if 'a' in word.lower()))
mutants.mutated_line: return sorted(set((word.lower() for word in words if '' in word.lower())))
